You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
ENHANCE YOUR CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE WITH SALESFORCE FEEDBACK MANAGEMENT
Create Data Maps to Send Custom Notifications Based on Survey Responses

Send custom notifications to alert your agents about survey responses. You can send custom notifications for every response or define response conditions to send notifications.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS
USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To create or update data maps:	
Create and send survey permissions
Read and Create permission for the objects whose records the data map creates or updates
Read and Create permission for fields that the data map creates or updates
Read permission for records with mapped ID
Read permission for Account, Opportunity, User, and Group objects

To view data maps:	Read permission for the Survey object
To view notification types:	View Setup and Configuration
To create and edit notification types:	Customize Application
Available in: both Salesforce Classic (not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
Available with the Feedback Management - Starter and Feedback Management - Growth licenses. The Salesforce org must also have the Industry Service Excellence or the Industry Sales Excellence license 
NOTE Custom notification for survey data maps isn't available in managed packages.
In Survey Builder, click Advanced Settings, and then select Survey Data Mapping.
Click Add Data Map.

You can create up to 20 data maps for a survey.

Name the mapping.
For Action Type, select Send Custom Notification.
Select a notification type.

You can see the list of existing custom notifications in your org. To learn how to create custom notifications in Salesforce, see Create a Desktop or Mobile Notification.

Enter a notification title.
Add a notification body.
Select a recipient.
Record	Select a value from Users, Opportunities, Accounts, or Public Group.
Invitation Field	Select a field from the Survey Invitation object whose value maps to a user, account, or group.
Participant Record	Select a field value from the participant record configured as merge field.
Associated Record	Select a field value from the associated record configured as merge field.
Add more recipients if necessary.

You can add up to 5 recipients in a map.

Select the condition type.
Every time	Send a custom notification
Based on conditions	Define rules about when to send a custom notification
If you selected Based on conditions as the condition type, then define the conditions.
Select whether to send notifications for all or specific conditions that you define.
Select a logic type.
Response to Question: Define the condition based on responses to questions in the survey
Response Field: Define the condition based on the value of the response field
Invitation Field: Define the condition based on the value of the invitation field
Associated Record: Define the condition based on the value of the related object merge field
Participant Record: Define the condition based on the value of the participant object merge field
Custom Variable: Define the condition based on the value of the custom variable merge field
Org Variable: Define the condition based on the value of the org variable merge field
Select a question, response field, invitation field, field, or variable based on the logic type that you selected.
Select an operator.
Select a response or enter a value that validates the condition.

The values of merge fields appear as API names. For example, the value of an owner name field appears as OwnerId.

To define more conditions, click Add Condition.
Save the mapping and the survey.
Activate the survey.
In the Survey Builder, click Send, and then click Get Invitation.
Copy the survey link, and send it to your participants.
From the App Launcher, find and select Surveys.
Open the survey record that you created.
In the Related tab, open the survey invitation link.
Select Sharing.
Select the custom notification recipient that you added in the data map.
Select Read/Write as the access level, and then save it.
DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Let us know so we can improve!
Yes
No
title: Create Custom Notifications for Survey Responses
